title: Deluxe Room
text: Experience comfort and style in our Deluxe Room, featuring modern amenities and elegant decor. Enjoy a peaceful stay with high-speed WiFi, smart security, and 24/7 online support.
longdesc: Experience the epitome of refined luxury in our Deluxe Room at Swagat Hotel Bhiwadi, meticulously crafted to offer you a serene retreat in the heart of the city. With its tasteful decor, plush furnishings, and thoughtful amenities, this room provides the perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. Stay connected with high-speed WiFi, enjoy the peace of mind provided by smart security systems, and benefit from our dedicated 24/7 online support. Sink into the plush bedding and indulge in the convenience of in-room dining options, ensuring a seamless and enjoyable stay experience for every guest. At Swagat Hotel Bhiwadi, we understand the importance of a restful night's sleep, which is why our Deluxe Room features soundproofing and blackout curtains to ensure you wake up feeling refreshed and rejuvenated. Start your day with a refreshing shower in the sleek bathroom, equipped with premium toiletries and fluffy towels. Then, savor a delicious breakfast served in the comfort of your room, prepared with locally sourced ingredients to tantalize your taste buds. Whether you're traveling for business or pleasure, our Deluxe Room provides the perfect sanctuary to escape the hustle and bustle of everyday life and indulge in a truly luxurious experience.
rules: Check-in time from 2 PM, check-out by 10 AM.
cancellation: At Swagat Hotel Bhiwadi, we understand plans can change. Cancel up to 7 days prior for a Full Refund.

title: Super Deluxe Room

Indulge in the ultimate comfort of our Super Deluxe Room, where every detail has been carefully curated to enhance your experience.
